title: Jorge Castro (footballer)
text:
Jorge Alejandro Castro Salazar (born 11 September 1990) is a <a href="Costa%20Rica">Costa Rica</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>.
Club career.
He started his career at <a href="Deportivo%20Saprissa">Deportivo Saprissa</a> before signing a four-year contract with Start in December 2012.
International career.
Castro played at the <a href="2007%20FIFA%20U-17%20World%20Championship">2007 FIFA U-17 World Championship</a> and <a href="2009%20FIFA%20World%20Youth%20Championship">2009 FIFA World Youth Championship</a>.
He was part of the <a href="Costa%20Rica%20national%20football%20team">Costa Rica national football team</a> squad for the <a href="2011%20Copa%20Am%C3%A9rica">2011 Copa América</a>, but did not play at all in the tournament.
